title: World of Warcraft Books [up to Vol'jin: Shadows of the Horde]
description:
Warcraft History
======== =======

Most of the Warcraft series takes place on the planet of Azeroth. Other planets in the Warcraft universe include: Draenor (and its shattered remnants, known as Outland), Argus, K'aresh, and Xoroth. There are also several metaphysical areas mentioned, including the Emerald Dream, the Elemental Planes, the Twisting Nether, and the Great Dark Beyond. Warcraft: Orcs & Humans, the first game in the series, takes place in the human kingdom of Azeroth.

Contents
========

These are the books who cover the histories from the World of Warcraft.

The contents are mostly in .epub, except for Vol'jin history, which is a .mobi file.

The histories are:

The War of the Ancients
=======================

1 - Well of Eternity, The.epub
2 - Demon Soul, The.epub
3 - The Sundering.epub

Warcraft
========

1 - Of Blood and Honor.epub
2 - Day of the Dragon.epub
3 - Lord of the Clans.epub
4 - Last Guardian, The.epub

World of Warcraft
=================

1 - Cycle of Hatred.epub
2 - Rise of the Horde.epub
3 - Tide of Darkness.epub
4 - Beyond the Dark Portal.epub
5 - Night of the Dragon.epub
6 - Arthas_ Rise of the Lich King.epub
7 - Stormrage.epub
8 - The Shattering_ Prelude to Cataclysm.epub
9 - Thrall_ Twilight of the Aspects.epub
10 - Wolfheart.epub
11 - Jaina Proudmoore_ Tides of War.epub
12 - Dawn of the Aspects_ Part I.epub
13 - Dawn of the Aspects_ Part II.epub
14 - Dawn of the Aspects_ Part III.epub
15 - Dawn of the Aspects_ Part IV.epub
16 - Dawn of the Aspects_ Part V.epub
17 - Vol'jin_ Shadows of the Horde.mobi

All ebooks have an .opf file with all description and a front cover, for use on Calibre.
